author: Chef Ranveer Brar
message: Indian food is an emotion, a celebration of spices and stories.

author: Padma Lakshmi
message: Every region of India tells its own culinary tale through food.

author: Vikas Khanna
message: Our dishes are more than recipes—they're memories passed down generations.

author: Sanjeev Kapoor

author: Madhur Jaffrey
message: Indian cuisine is incredibly diverse—each dish is a journey through culture.
